column5: Does anyone know where I can buy a Smoke Detector / Carbon Monoxide Detector unit that is hardwired and has a battery backup?  Thanks,  Entropy

http://www.homehardware.ca/en/rec/index.htm/Hardware/Home-Security/Detectors/Smoke/Wire-In-Smoke-and-Carbon-Monoxide-Detector/_/N-2pqfZ67l/Ne-67n/Ntk-All_EN/R-I3616714?Ntt=Smoke  thanks, now does this thing have an alarm in addition to the talking feature?  anyone have this one?
Mine talks. When the battery is low,it will beep intermintly.  It,s so annoying,you will change the battery fast.
Oh ya,batteries are not cheap,but life is worth more.
That is all I use in the condos I maintain. You can't go wrong with Kidd brand. Hard wire with 9 volt battery backup.
thanks, picked up two today, they were $45 at CT.  Now to find the energy / motivation / ladder / and or time to put them up. lol.
